Articles.Content:
Ooh, ooh, can I have a flag that's like the American one, but with green (not too dark but not too light) and blue stripes, with the box a darker green?

Thobe can obviously do a better job, but that oughta hold you over till he can finish one proper.

Could you make a flag That is solid dark red with Rage097 In the middle in white letters. A very futuristic font would be nice.

Same to you as to Dead-o down there.

http://i.imgur.com/nz5HfiU.jpg

It's really large, so I'm linking it instead of posting it to prevent page stretch :/

http://i.imgur.com/nz5hfiu.jpg

it's really large, so i'm linking it instead of posting it to prevent page stretch :/

colorsplosion

I made this one the correct size and file. but i would like to have the american flag in the background. is that possible?

Edit: also do the flags have to be flat, or can they have waves in them?

Edited May 23, 2013 by viperwolf

-snip- I made this one the correct size and file. but i would like to have the american flag in the background. is that possible?

Edit: also do the flags have to be flat, or can they have waves in them?

AFAIK, the wave's would just look wierd, since there's a wave animation for the flags but they can be there. Also, I believe yes, American Flag background should be no problem.

AFAIK, the wave's would just look wierd, since there's a wave animation for the flags but they can be there. Also, I believe yes, American Flag background should be no problem.

ah yes you make a good point about the waves thank you.
hey! I'd love to help with custom flags but I dont know how to add them to the thread!?

Thobe can obviously do a better job, but that oughta hold you over till he can finish one proper.

I like that one, but I think the stars really need to be a color, perhaps light green?

hey! I'd love to help with custom flags but I dont know how to add them to the thread!?

upload to imgur, or something similar. copy url then select (insert image) in the post reply. that is how i do it anyway

EDIT: new post.

Edited May 23, 2013 by RockyTV
viperwolf:
International Kerbal Space Program
I need a mission flag for my grand tour. I'd like it on a black background, showing all the planets orbiting the sun, with the words "JSP Grand Tour" underneath a green lightsaber. Thanks!
Thank you very much, i appreciate your work
